text: Francesco Caccianemici (16th century) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period. He was born in Bologna, and trained under Primaticcio, whom he accompanied to work for the Court of King Francis I of France at Fontainebleau. He also worked there with Il Rosso. ==References== * Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Bolognese painters Category:Renaissance painters Category:Year of birth unknown Category:Year of death unknown
title: Francesco Caccianemici
